user_query: I'm interested in the forecast data for Bitcoin. Can you predict the next 10 periods using the 1-hour timeframe? Also, I would like to check the status of my generated job and action job using the task ID '6aa04ebe-3590-4d51-a499-7c2daf51cca2'.

TaskList.description: Query the historical price data for Bitcoin to prepare for forecast analysis.
Use the historical price data to predict the next 10 periods for Bitcoin in the 1-hour timeframe.
Check the status of the job using the provided task ID '6aa04ebe-3590-4d51-a499-7c2daf51cca2'.
